title: Textile, ca. 1825
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp: 175 cm (68 3/4 in.)
Weft: 77.5 cm (30 1/2 in.)
Height of repeat: 58 cm (22 3/4 in.)
description: Four scenes, captioned in French, of marriage; asking for the woman's hand, the civil ceremony, the bedding of the bride and the day after the marriage. In purple on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1825.
ca. 1825. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-198.
